seo.title: Terms of Service | StockEasy
seo.description: Review the terms of service for StockEasy, inventory management platform for Shopify.

notice.title: Important Information
notice.content: By using StockEasy, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our service.

object.title: 1. Purpose
object.content: These Terms of Service (ToS) define the terms and conditions for using the StockEasy platform and the services offered. By accessing and using our platform, you accept these ToS without reservation.

registration.title: 2.1. Registration
registration.content: Using StockEasy requires creating an account through Shopify. You agree to provide accurate information and keep it updated. You are responsible for the confidentiality of your login credentials.

eligibility.title: 2.2. Eligibility Requirements
eligibility.content: StockEasy is intended for professionals and businesses using Shopify for their e-commerce activities. You must have the legal capacity to contract and use our services.

shopify.title: 2.3. Shopify Integration
shopify.content: Our service requires connection to your Shopify store. By installing the application, you authorize StockEasy to access data necessary for service operation (products, inventory, orders). This authorization can be revoked at any time from your Shopify interface.

features.title: 3.1. Main Features
features.content: StockEasy offers an inventory management solution including: real-time synchronization with Shopify, AI-powered stock forecasting, supplier order management, stock-out alerts, advanced reports and analytics, multi-location management (depending on your subscription plan).

availability.title: 3.2. Availability
availability.content: We strive to maintain service availability 24/7. However, interruptions may occur for maintenance, updates or force majeure. We are committed to minimizing these interruptions and informing you when possible.

plans.title: 4.1. Subscription Plans
plans.content: StockEasy offers different subscription plans (Basic, Pro, Plus) with adapted features. Prices are in USD and subject to change. Any price changes will be communicated with 30 days notice.

billing.title: 4.2. Billing
billing.content: Subscriptions are billed monthly through Shopify. Payment is automatically charged at the beginning of each billing period. In case of payment default, service access may be suspended.

trial.title: 4.3. Trial Period
trial.content: A free trial period may be offered to new users. At the end of this period, your subscription will be automatically activated unless you cancel.

rights.title: 5.1. Right to Cancel
rights.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your Shopify interface or by contacting us. Cancellation will take effect at the end of your current billing period. No pro-rata refund will be made for the current period.

suspension.title: 5.2. Suspension by StockEasy
suspension.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access in case of violation of these ToS, fraudulent use, or non-payment.

data.title: 5.3. Data Retention
data.content: After termination, your data will be retained for 30 days to allow you to recover it. After this period, your data will be permanently deleted from our systems.

usage.title: 6.1. Proper Use
usage.content: You agree to use StockEasy in accordance with its intended purpose and not to: attempt to access unauthorized computer systems, disrupt service operation, use the service for illegal or fraudulent purposes, transmit viruses or malicious code, resell or redistribute access to the service.

data.title: 6.2. Data Responsibility
data.content: You are responsible for the accuracy and quality of data you import into StockEasy. We cannot be held responsible for errors or inaccuracies in your source data.

service.title: 7.1. Service "As Is"
service.content: StockEasy is provided "as is" and "as available". We do not guarantee that the service will be error-free or uninterrupted. We strive to provide accurate forecasts, but these are algorithm-based and do not constitute a guarantee.

damages.title: 7.2. Damages Limitation
damages.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, our total liability to you for any damages resulting from the use or inability to use StockEasy is limited to the amount you paid for the service in the last 12 months.

By using our services, you grant us a limited license to process your data solely for providing our services.

seo.description: Learn how StockEasy protects your personal data and respects your privacy in compliance with GDPR.

rgpd.title: GDPR Compliance
rgpd.content: This privacy policy complies with the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Your data is processed transparently, securely and with respect for your rights.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: At StockEasy, we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy explains what data we collect, why we collect it, how we use it and what your rights are. This policy applies to all users of the StockEasy platform.

controller.title: 2. Data Controller
controller.content: The controller of your personal data is StockEasy SAS, a simplified joint-stock company with capital of â‚¬10,000, headquartered in Paris, France. For any questions regarding the protection of your data, contact us at: contact@stockeasy.app

legal.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
legal.content: We process your data on the following legal bases: Contract execution: processing necessary to provide our services. Legitimate interest: service improvement, security, fraud prevention. Consent: marketing, non-essential cookies. Legal obligations: regulatory compliance, accounting obligations.

providers.title: 6.1. Service Providers
providers.content: We share your data with trusted third-party providers: Shopify (e-commerce platform), Vercel (hosting), Supabase (database), Sentry (error monitoring), Email services for notifications. These providers are contractually bound to protect your data and can only use it for the purposes we share it.

transfers.title: 6.2. International Transfers
transfers.content: Some of our providers may be located outside the European Union. In this case, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place (standard contractual clauses, Privacy Shield, etc.).

legal.title: 6.3. Legal Obligations
legal.content: We may disclose your data if required by law or in response to a legal request (subpoena, search warrant, etc.).

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data: Data encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS) and at rest. Strict access control and multi-factor authentication for our teams. Continuous monitoring and intrusion detection. Regular backups and disaster recovery plan. Periodic security audits. Regular penetration testing.

active.title: 8.1. Active Account
active.content: Your data is retained while your account is active and for the duration necessary to provide our services.

closed.title: 8.2. Closed Account
closed.content: After closing your account, your data is retained for 30 days to allow possible recovery. After this period, your data is permanently deleted.

legal.title: 8.3. Legal Obligations
legal.content: Some data may be retained longer to meet our legal obligations (accounting, tax, etc.), generally 5 to 10 years depending on applicable legislation.

list.title: 9.1. GDPR Rights
list.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights: Right of access: obtain a copy of your personal data. Right of rectification: correct inaccurate or incomplete data. Right to erasure: request deletion of your data. Right to restriction: limit processing of your data. Right to portability: receive your data in a structured format. Right to object: object to processing of your data. Right to withdraw your consent at any time.

exercise.title: 9.2. Exercising Your Rights
exercise.content: To exercise your rights, contact us at: contact@stockeasy.app. We will respond to your request within one month. In case of difficulty, you can file a complaint with your national data protection authority.

minors.title: 10. Minor's Data
minors.content: StockEasy is a service for professionals. We do not knowingly collect personal data from persons under 18. If you learn that a minor has provided us with personal data, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: 11. Policy Modifications
changes.content: We may modify this privacy policy at any time. Modifications will be communicated by email and via our platform. The last update date is indicated at the top of this page. Your continued use of the service after notification constitutes your acceptance of the modifications.
